channel.title: How To Add in a Function For JMenu On Client
channel.description:
Hey Guyz well i was wondering how do i add in a Server Ip Menu Function on a JMenu like i want to add in a Tab Called "Worlds" and one will be to a different ip and the other will be to another. So like i can change ips. back and forth using that function ?
Is it possible. Example If i want to go to World 2 I go to The World Tab on the Client. Then Click World 2 and the Ip changes. Can it be done if so please can u paste the code and were to post it? under Gui?
Like i want to be able to switch through ip's using this function i remember a client that had it. Thanks
